殠字的基本解释

殠
chòu
古同“臭”，腐臭气味：“昔帝尧之葬也……其穿下不乱泉，上不泄殠。”

殠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chòu］
［《廣韻》尺救切，去宥，昌。］
［《廣韻》許久切，上有，曉。］
腐臭的气味。

殠字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殠； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页582第30
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?尺救切，音臭。【說文】腐氣也。【玉篇】物傷氣也。【前漢·楊王孫傳】其穿下不及泉，上不泄臭。又【楊惲傳】單于得漢美食好物，謂之殠惡。　又【集韻】許救切。音嗅。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?許久切，音朽。臭也。　【集韻】或省作臰。【韻會】本作殠，通作臭。【左傳·註疏】臭是氣總名，元非善惡之稱。旣謂善氣爲香，則專以惡氣爲臭。殠字从歺作。

考證：〔【楊惲傳】單于得漢美食好物，以爲殠惡。〕　謹照原文以爲改謂之。
殠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
殠字的起名意思

暂无。

Sha
Basic explanation of words
Sha
chòu
Gu Tong is "stinky", with a rancid smell: "Xi Di Yao's burial is also... It doesn't mess up the spring when you wear it, and it doesn't let go."
Sha
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chòu］
["Guangyun" ruler saves and cuts, goes to You, Chang. ]
["Guangyun" has been cut for a long time, there is on it, Xiao. ]
Rancid smell.
Sha
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殠; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 582 30
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ruler saves the cut, the sound is smelly. [Said the text] Corruption is also. [Jade articles] Things hurt the qi. [Previous Han·Yang Wangsun Biography] It can't be worn as well as the spring, and it doesn't let off the smell. Also [Yang Yun's Biography] It is said that it is evil to get good food from Han.　[Jiyun] Xu Jiuqie. Sound smell. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? After a long time, the sound is rotten. Stink too.　【Jiyun】or provincial Zuozhan. [Rhyme Club] This is a shame, but it is stinky. [Zuo Zhuan·Notes] Stink is the general name of qi, not the name of good and evil. It is said that good odor is fragrance, while bad odor is used exclusively as odor. The word 殠 is made from 歺. Textual research: [[Yang Yun's Biography] Shan Yu got the good food of Han Dynasty, thought it was evil. 〕　I would like to change the name according to the original text.
